CN.content:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Lithium |
| Alkylated thiophene |
| Tri-butyltin chloride |
| Tri-butyl(4alkylthiophene-2-yl)stannane |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with only the valid "Material Name" entities:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Alkylated thiophene |
| Tri-butyl(4alkylthiophene-2-yl)stannane |

I removed "Lithium" and "Tri-butyltin chloride" as they are not clearly referred to as "Material names" in the paragraph.
